Package com.complexible.common.memory

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Addressable
    Interface for an object which is stored off heap and accessible via its address in memory.
    HashableObjectSerializer<T>
    An ObjectSerializer which supports a native hasher for the objects which it serializes
    HeapPool
    Utility class to track heap usage.
    MemoryFlyweight
    Interface indicating that an object implements the flyweight pattern.
    MemoryPool
    A pool of memory from which allocations can occur.
    ObjectSerializer<T>
    An serializer which can round-trip POJOs to bytes for storage off heap or on disk.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractObjectSerializer<T>
    HashableObjectSerializerImpl<T>
    HeapPools  
    Memory
    Utility class around allocating memory via Unsafe
    MemoryPools
    Utilities for MemoryPool
    PrimitiveSerializers
    Serializers for Java primitives
    PrimitiveSerializers.LongSerializer  
    Reference
    Reference to an object stored off heap to facilitate flyweight access.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NotEnoughMemoryException
    An exception to signal that a MemoryPool has been exhausted and cannot allocate any more memory.
